message: Bob, I believe this product has great potential for you, given its value of $1,000,000. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a fair value for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible for you to consider reducing the price to $850,000? This would allow me to make the purchase while staying within my financial limits.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $850,000 is below my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $900,000 to facilitate this deal. This price still allows me a decent return on the product's value. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. I'm glad we're finding common ground. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $875,000 for the product. This price respects the value of the product while allowing me to stay within my budget. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
